Quote.Author: William Safire
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm willing to zap conservatives when they do things that are not libertarian

Quote.Author: William Safire
Quote.QuoteValue: Writers who used to show off their erudition no longer sing in the bare ruined choir of the media

Quote.Author: William Safire
Quote.QuoteValue: When I need to know the meaning of a word, I look it up in a dictionary

Quote.Author: William Safire
Quote.QuoteValue: When articulation is impossible, gesticulation comes to the rescue

Quote.Author: William Safire
Quote.QuoteValue: Have a definite opinion

Quote.Author: William Safire
Quote.QuoteValue: I think we all have a need to know what we do not need to know

Quote.Author: William Shatner
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to create your life. You have to carve it, like a sculpture

Quote.Author: William Shatner
Quote.QuoteValue: You need to be silly to be funny

Quote.Author: William Shatner
Quote.QuoteValue: The longer I go about living, I see it's the relationship that is most meaningful

Quote.Author: William Shatner
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm surfing the giant life wave

Quote.Author: William Shatner
Quote.QuoteValue: How do I stay so healthy and boyishly handsome? It's simple. I drink the blood of young runaways

Quote.Author: William Shatner
Quote.QuoteValue: I often conduct interviews in my truck

Quote.Author: William Shatner
Quote.QuoteValue: The basic quality that any great story must have is a story that illustrates the human condition

Quote.Author: William Shatner
Quote.QuoteValue: Divorce is probably as painful as death

Quote.Author: William Shatner
Quote.QuoteValue: Energy is the key to creativity. Energy is the key to life

Quote.Author: William Shatner
Quote.QuoteValue: I think making a good film shot is joyful

Quote.Author: William Shenstone
Quote.QuoteValue: A miser grows rich by seeming poor; an extravagant man grows poor by seeming rich

Quote.Author: William Shenstone
Quote.QuoteValue: Jealousy is the fear or apprehension of superiority: envy our uneasiness under it

Quote.Author: William Shenstone
Quote.QuoteValue: Every single instance of a friend's insincerity increases our dependence on the efficacy of money

Quote.Author: William Shenstone
Quote.QuoteValue: The eye must be easy, before it can be pleased

Quote.Author: William Shenstone
Quote.QuoteValue: A fool and his words are soon parted

Quote.Author: William Shenstone
Quote.QuoteValue: A man has generally the good or ill qualities, which he attributes to mankind

Quote.Author: William Shenstone
Quote.QuoteValue: Every good poet includes a critic, but the reverse is not true

Quote.Author: William Shenstone
Quote.QuoteValue: Virtues, like essences, lose their fragrance when exposed

Quote.Author: William Shenstone
Quote.QuoteValue: Poetry and consumption are the most flattering of diseases

Quote.Author: William Shenstone
Quote.QuoteValue: What leads to unhappiness, is making pleasure the chief aim

Quote.Author: William Tecumseh Sherman
Quote.QuoteValue: War is cruelty. There is no use trying to reform it. The crueler it is, the sooner it will be over

Quote.Author: William Tecumseh Sherman
Quote.QuoteValue: I intend to make Georgia howl

Quote.Author: William Tecumseh Sherman
Quote.QuoteValue: If nominated, I will not run; if elected, I will not serve

Quote.Author: William Tecumseh Sherman
Quote.QuoteValue: The voice of the people is the voice of humbug

Quote.Author: William Tecumseh Sherman
Quote.QuoteValue: I beg to present you as a Christmas gift the city of Savannah

Quote.Author: William Tecumseh Sherman
Quote.QuoteValue: War is hell

Quote.Author: William Tecumseh Sherman
Quote.QuoteValue: There is many a boy here today who looks on war as all glory, but, boys, it is all hell

Quote.Author: William Tecumseh Sherman
Quote.QuoteValue: A battery of field artillery is worth a thousand muskets

Quote.Author: William Tecumseh Sherman
Quote.QuoteValue: Courage - a perfect sensibility of the measure of danger, and a mental willingness to endure it

Quote.Author: William Tecumseh Sherman
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't have my army supplied, and keep it supplied, we'll eat your mules up, sir

Quote.Author: William Weld
Quote.QuoteValue: The courts are truly the least dangerous of the three branches of our government

Quote.Author: William Weld
Quote.QuoteValue: I think coercive taxation is theft, and government has a moral duty to keep it to a minimum

Quote.Author: William Weld
Quote.QuoteValue: Much is forgiven anyone who relieves the desperate boredom of the working press

Quote.Author: William Weld
Quote.QuoteValue: I have come to realize that Jesse Helms stands for everything in politics that is anathema to me

Quote.Author: William Weld
Quote.QuoteValue: Liberals often don't see the problems, and conservatives don't see the promise, of government

Quote.Author: William Weld
Quote.QuoteValue: So government acts as a safeguard of our property

Quote.Author: William Weld
Quote.QuoteValue: Government has a role as well in what is referred to as redistributive justice

Quote.Author: William Weld
Quote.QuoteValue: Government is never so noble as when it is addressing wrongs

Quote.Author: William Weld
Quote.QuoteValue: I think government has a major role to play in helping us with the pursuit of happiness

Quote.Author: William Weld
Quote.QuoteValue: There are several such issues where I have departed radically from the Republican orthodoxy

Quote.Author: William Westmoreland
Quote.QuoteValue: Without censorship, things can get terribly confused in the public mind

Quote.Author: William Westmoreland
Quote.QuoteValue: War is fear cloaked in courage

Quote.Author: William Westmoreland
Quote.QuoteValue: Television is an instrument which can paralyze this country

Quote.Author: William Westmoreland
Quote.QuoteValue: The military don't start wars. Politicians start wars

Quote.Author: William Westmoreland
Quote.QuoteValue: We moved in to help the Vietnamese defend their country and confront the Viet Cong

Quote.Author: William Westmoreland
Quote.QuoteValue: It became very clear that Hanoi was in effect strategically running the Viet Cong operation

Quote.Author: William Westmoreland
Quote.QuoteValue: We were succeeding. When you looked at specifics, this became a war of attrition. We were winning

Quote.Author: William Westmoreland
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think I have been loved by my troops, but I think I have been respected

Quote.Author: William Westmoreland
Quote.QuoteValue: We had the best food any battlefield ever had

Quote.Author: William Westmoreland
Quote.QuoteValue: Militarily, we succeeded in Vietnam. We won every engagement we were involved in out there

Quote.Author: William Wordsworth
Quote.QuoteValue: Come forth into the light of things, let nature be your teacher

Quote.Author: William Wordsworth
Quote.QuoteValue: The flower that smells the sweetest is shy and lowly

Quote.Author: William Wordsworth
Quote.QuoteValue: The ocean is a mighty harmonist

Quote.Author: William Wordsworth
Quote.QuoteValue: Suffering is permanent, obscure and dark, And shares the nature of infinity

Quote.Author: William Wordsworth
Quote.QuoteValue: What is pride? A rocket that emulates the stars

Quote.Author: William Wordsworth
Quote.QuoteValue: Fill your paper with the breathings of your heart

Quote.Author: William Wordsworth
Quote.QuoteValue: Not without hope we suffer and we mourn

Quote.Author: William Wordsworth
Quote.QuoteValue: To me the meanest flower that blows can give thoughts that do often lie too deep for tears

Quote.Author: William Wordsworth
Quote.QuoteValue: To begin, begin

Quote.Author: William Wordsworth
Quote.QuoteValue: Pictures deface walls more often than they decorate them

Quote.Author: William Wyler
Quote.QuoteValue: Stills belong in the lobby, not on the screen

Quote.Author: William Wyler
Quote.QuoteValue: It's eighty percent script and twenty percent you get great actors. There's nothing else to it

Quote.Author: William Wyler
Quote.QuoteValue: Great pictures can't be entirely fictitious

Quote.Author: William Wyler
Quote.QuoteValue: There's only one prima donna in my pictures, and that's me!

Quote.Author: William Wyler
Quote.QuoteValue: The slightest thing can ruin a scene, but you must be willing to take chances

Quote.Author: William Wyler
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything a director does must help the story and the performances. Otherwise, it is useless

Quote.Author: William Wyler
Quote.QuoteValue: To me it's more fun and more challenging, too, to do different types of pictures

Quote.Author: William Wyler
Quote.QuoteValue: If Beethoven could write his 'Eroica Symphony' stone deaf, then William Wyler can do a musical

Quote.Author: William Wyler
Quote.QuoteValue: Confusion seems to have become the vogue of European directors

Quote.Author: William Wyler
Quote.QuoteValue: There is nothing clever about confusion

Quote.Author: Willie Aames
Quote.QuoteValue: It's easy to be led astray when you're so broken. People take advantage of you

Quote.Author: Willie Aames
Quote.QuoteValue: God continues to work miracles in my life

Quote.Author: Willie Aames
Quote.QuoteValue: I never thought of myself as handsome

Quote.Author: Willie Aames
Quote.QuoteValue: I remember thinking, That's what I need - and that hope was in Jesus Christ

Quote.Author: Willie Aames
Quote.QuoteValue: We produce programs that honor God and impact our world

Quote.Author: Willie Aames
Quote.QuoteValue: This is an exact replica of my chest

Quote.Author: Willie Aames
Quote.QuoteValue: This is not what I would have chosen. But I have a heart to be obedient

Quote.Author: Willie Aames
Quote.QuoteValue: We've been called, and He has blessed

Quote.Author: Willie Aames
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think you need to go looking for the enemy. He's going to look for you

Quote.Author: Willie Aames
Quote.QuoteValue: If there's comfort involved, it's probably not for me

Quote.Author: Willie Geist
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're young, the blue blazer feels like a grown-up costume

Quote.Author: Willie Geist
Quote.QuoteValue: It doesn't matter if you're famous or infamous. All that matters is you're a celebrity

Quote.Author: Willie Geist
Quote.QuoteValue: Chris Rock is a very funny man

Quote.Author: Willie Geist
Quote.QuoteValue: Bachelor parties would pay a lot of money to hire Pat Buchanan to come

Quote.Author: Willie Geist
Quote.QuoteValue: I've had two pedicures in my life, and they were glorious

Quote.Author: Willie Geist
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm pretty sure people are going to start writing letters again once the email fad passes

Quote.Author: Willie Geist
Quote.QuoteValue: The thing about me is that I don't judge my audience. I welcome. It is a big tent

Quote.Author: Willie Geist
Quote.QuoteValue: Do whatever you want to do in the privacy of your own home

Quote.Author: Willie Geist
Quote.QuoteValue: Golf is the only sport where watching the game is arguably as grueling physically as playing it

Quote.Author: Willie Geist
Quote.QuoteValue: When you live in New York City, you run up a long list of things you've been meaning to do

Quote.Author: Willie Mays
Quote.QuoteValue: They throw the ball, I hit it. They hit the ball, I catch it

Quote.Author: Willie Mays
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I was the best baseball player I ever saw

Quote.Author: Willie Mays
Quote.QuoteValue: Defense to me is the key to playing baseball

Quote.Author: Willie Mays
Quote.QuoteValue: Yes, I had to learn how to live life outside, but I had so many people help me

Quote.Author: Willie Mays
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't compare 'em, I just catch 'em

Quote.Author: Willie Mays
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not hard. When I'm not hitting, I don't hit nobody. But when I'm hitting, I hit anybody

Quote.Author: Willie Mays
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't mean to be bashful, but I was

Quote.Author: Willie Mays
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't say I was that smart, I said I went to class and I enjoyed what I was doing

Quote.Author: Willie Mays
Quote.QuoteValue: Every time I look at my pocketbook, I see Jackie Robinson

Quote.Author: Willie Mays
Quote.QuoteValue: When I'm not hitting, I don't hit nobody. But, when I'm hitting, I hit anybody

Quote.Author: Willie Nelson
Quote.QuoteValue: Once you replace negative thoughts with positive ones, you'll start having positive results

Quote.Author: Willie Nelson
Quote.QuoteValue: When I started counting my blessings, my whole life turned around

Quote.Author: Willie Nelson
Quote.QuoteValue: I been a long time leaving but I'm going to be a long time gone

Quote.Author: Willie Nelson
Quote.QuoteValue: If you really want to get along with somebody, let them be themselves

Quote.Author: Willie Nelson
Quote.QuoteValue: Three chords and the truth - that's what a country song is

Quote.Author: Willie Nelson
Quote.QuoteValue: I like myself better when I'm writing regularly

Quote.Author: Willie Nelson
Quote.QuoteValue: You know why divorces are so expensive? They're worth it

Quote.Author: Willie Nelson
Quote.QuoteValue: If you got the money honey I got the time and when you run out of money honey I run out of time

Quote.Author: Willie Nelson
Quote.QuoteValue: We're still here trying to get the word out that 330 farmers are quitting every week

Quote.Author: Willie Nelson
Quote.QuoteValue: As long as there's a few farmers out there, we'll keep fighting for them

Quote.Author: Willie Stargell
Quote.QuoteValue: A World Series trophy is a wonderful thing to behold

Quote.Author: Willie Stargell
Quote.QuoteValue: I love September, especially when we're in it

Quote.Author: Willie Stargell
Quote.QuoteValue: It's supposed to be fun, the man says 'Play Ball' not 'Work Ball' you know

Quote.Author: Willie Stargell
Quote.QuoteValue: You only have a few years to play this game and you can't play it if you're all tied up in knots

Quote.Author: Willie Stargell
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is one big transition

Quote.Author: Willie Stargell
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm proud of the fact that I'm the only player to hit a ball completely out of Dodger Stadium

Quote.Author: Willie Stargell
Quote.QuoteValue: Helping someone is what life is all about

Quote.Author: Willie Stargell
Quote.QuoteValue: Human beings are pampered by the Lord. Their real tests don't come until later in life

Quote.Author: Willie Stargell
Quote.QuoteValue: Simple pleasures were all the pleasures that I knew as a child

Quote.Author: Willie Stargell
Quote.QuoteValue: I would always reserve a special place in my heart for Pittsburgh

Quote.Author: Wilson Mizner
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't talk about yourself; it will be done when you leave

Quote.Author: Wilson Mizner
Quote.QuoteValue: Gambling: The sure way of getting nothing for something

Quote.Author: Wilson Mizner
Quote.QuoteValue: If you count all your assets you always show a profit

Quote.Author: Wilson Mizner
Quote.QuoteValue: If you steal from one author it's plagiarism; if you steal from many it's research

Quote.Author: Wilson Mizner
Quote.QuoteValue: To profit from good advice requires more wisdom than to give it

Quote.Author: Wilson Mizner
Quote.QuoteValue: You sparkle with larceny

Quote.Author: Wilson Mizner
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not in life, but in art that self-fulfillment is to be found

Quote.Author: Wilson Mizner
Quote.QuoteValue: There is something about a closet that makes a skeleton terribly restless

Quote.Author: Wilson Mizner
Quote.QuoteValue: In the battle of existence, Talent is the punch; Tact is the clever footwork

Quote.Author: Wilson Mizner
Quote.QuoteValue: Those who welcome death have only tried it from the ears up

Quote.Author: Win Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: The idea of peer critique, of talking about each other's art - I just found it so useless

Quote.Author: Win Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: I love my iPhone; it's great to have a camera around all the time

Quote.Author: Win Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone has their own talents. It's up to the individual to see what you can actually do

Quote.Author: Win Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: Usually, I think you have most of your musical influences locked down by the time you're 16

Quote.Author: Win Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a lot easier to sabotage your career than to have a career to sabotage

Quote.Author: Win Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: The cliched rock life never seemed that cool to me

Quote.Author: Win Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: I think there's some pretty amazing language in the Bible

Quote.Author: Win Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: I never really felt super-Texan. It wasn't like I was unhappy, but I wasn't superhappy

Quote.Author: Win Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not someone who can dance to a song I don't like

Quote.Author: Win Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: The idea of dancing to bad house music is something I could never get behind

Quote.Author: Winona Ryder
Quote.QuoteValue: You've got to grow up sometime

Quote.Author: Winona Ryder
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't pay enough money to... cure that feeling of being broken and confused

Quote.Author: Winona Ryder
Quote.QuoteValue: I've learned that it's OK to be flawed

Quote.Author: Winona Ryder
Quote.QuoteValue: I have this sense that I didn't really start growing up until my twenties

Quote.Author: Winona Ryder
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not into wrinkles

Quote.Author: Winona Ryder
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm used to being told what to say, but not what to think... that's usually left up to me

Quote.Author: Winona Ryder
Quote.QuoteValue: One of my worst fears is being a self-indulgent person

Quote.Author: Winona Ryder
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just coming from a more personal - and, I guess, more nostalgic - point of view

Quote.Author: Winona Ryder
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been fascinated with twins

Quote.Author: Winona Ryder
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to be a good friend, a good sister, a good person and a good actress

Quote.Author: Wislawa Szymborska
Quote.QuoteValue: Keep up the good work, if only for a while, if only for the twinkling of a tiny galaxy

Quote.Author: Wislawa Szymborska
Quote.QuoteValue: Somewhere out there the world must have an end

Quote.Author: Wislawa Szymborska
Quote.QuoteValue: This terrifying world is not devoid of charms, of the mornings that make waking up worthwhile

Quote.Author: Wislawa Szymborska
Quote.QuoteValue: You can find the entire cosmos lurking in its least remarkable objects

Quote.Author: Wislawa Szymborska
Quote.QuoteValue: All is mine but nothing owned, nothing owned for memory, and mine only while I look

Quote.Author: Wislawa Szymborska
Quote.QuoteValue: Even the worst book can give us something to think about

Quote.Author: Wislawa Szymborska
Quote.QuoteValue: Every beginning is only a sequel, after all, and the book of events is always open halfway through

Quote.Author: Wislawa Szymborska
Quote.QuoteValue: I like being near the top of a mountain. One can't get lost here

Quote.Author: Wislawa Szymborska
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm drowning in papers

Quote.Author: Wislawa Szymborska
Quote.QuoteValue: In every tragedy, an element of comedy is preserved. Comedy is just tragedy reversed

Quote.Author: Wiz Khalifa
Quote.QuoteValue: I have an idea of who I want to be, I have a vision of my own success

Quote.Author: Wiz Khalifa
Quote.QuoteValue: Every day is new. It's just a new day. I look at six hours at a time

Quote.Author: Wiz Khalifa
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm always hustling

Quote.Author: Wiz Khalifa
Quote.QuoteValue: I critique myself way harder than anybody else could critique me

Quote.Author: Wiz Khalifa
Quote.QuoteValue: I think wherever you go, when people hear good music, they will react to it

Quote.Author: Wiz Khalifa
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to be an icon

Quote.Author: Wiz Khalifa
Quote.QuoteValue: I never want to confuse people or go over their heads

Quote.Author: Wiz Khalifa
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't take time off

Quote.Author: Wiz Khalifa
Quote.QuoteValue: People connect with me just as a cool, around-the-way type of guy

Quote.Author: Wiz Khalifa
Quote.QuoteValue: I like a lot of old-school R and B, soul, and classic rock

Quote.Author: Wole Soyinka
Quote.QuoteValue: A tiger does not shout its tigritude, it acts

Quote.Author: Wole Soyinka
Quote.QuoteValue: Each time I think I've created time for myself, along comes a throwback to disrupt my private space

Quote.Author: Wole Soyinka
Quote.QuoteValue: Books and all forms of writing are terror to those who wish to suppress the truth

Quote.Author: Wole Soyinka
Quote.QuoteValue: The greatest threat to freedom is the absence of criticism

Quote.Author: Wole Soyinka
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a glutton for tranquility

Quote.Author: Wole Soyinka
Quote.QuoteValue: Human life has meaning only to that degree and as long as it is lived in the service of humanity

Quote.Author: Wole Soyinka
Quote.QuoteValue: I like my peace and quiet whenever I can grab it

Quote.Author: Wole Soyinka
Quote.QuoteValue: The hand that dips into the bottom of the pot will eat the biggest snail

Quote.Author: Wole Soyinka
Quote.QuoteValue: We live in a materialist world, and materialism appeals so strongly to humanity, no matter where

Quote.Author: Wole Soyinka
Quote.QuoteValue: But the ultimate lesson is just sit down and write. That's all

Quote.Author: Wolf Blitzer
Quote.QuoteValue: My rule of thumb is that if I am interested or intrigued by something, others will be as well

Quote.Author: Wolf Blitzer
Quote.QuoteValue: My best stories come from well-placed sources who point me in the right direction

Quote.Author: Wolf Blitzer
Quote.QuoteValue: My goal is to make the viewer a little bit smarter

Quote.Author: Wolf Blitzer
Quote.QuoteValue: I love politics

Quote.Author: Wolf Blitzer
Quote.QuoteValue: I eat right. I exercise. I run 5 miles a day on the treadmill

Quote.Author: Wolf Blitzer
Quote.QuoteValue: I tend to overwrite; I need a good editor

Quote.Author: Wolf Blitzer
Quote.QuoteValue: We'll have to wait the old-fashioned way

Quote.Author: Wolf Blitzer
Quote.QuoteValue: Looks like a pretty serious race unfolding

Quote.Author: Wolf Blitzer
Quote.QuoteValue: There are millions and millions of patriotic Muslim Americans

Quote.Author: Wolf Blitzer
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a few TVs

Quote.Author: Wolfgang Puck
Quote.QuoteValue: Italian food is all about ingredients and it's not fussy and it's not fancy

Quote.Author: Wolfgang Puck
Quote.QuoteValue: I learned more from the one restaurant that didn't work than from all the ones that were successes

Quote.Author: Wolfgang Puck
Quote.QuoteValue: The most important thing for me is to really buy the best ingredient

Quote.Author: Wolfgang Puck
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to be firm. But it is easier to be nice than to be nasty

Quote.Author: Wolfgang Puck
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of restaurants serve good food, but they don't have very good service

Quote.Author: Wolfgang Puck
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, cooking is an expression of the land where you are and the culture of that place

Quote.Author: Wolfgang Puck
Quote.QuoteValue: A chef is a mixture maybe of artistry and craft. You have to learn the craft really to get there

Quote.Author: Wolfgang Puck
Quote.QuoteValue: I think it's really important to keep on staying motivated

Quote.Author: Wolfgang Puck
Quote.QuoteValue: I like the Japanese knives, I like French knives. Whatever's sharp

Quote.Author: Wolfgang Puck
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was 27, if I didn't put 15 things in one dish I wasn't happy

Quote.Author: Woodrow Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: The history of liberty is a history of resistance

Quote.Author: Woodrow Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: The ear of the leader must ring with the voices of the people

Quote.Author: Woodrow Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: The man who is swimming against the stream knows the strength of it

Quote.Author: Woodrow Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: Never attempt to murder a man who is committing suicide

Quote.Author: Woodrow Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: Golf is a game in which one endeavors to control a ball with implements ill adapted for the purpose

Quote.Author: Woodrow Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: I not only use all the brains that I have, but all that I can borrow

Quote.Author: Woodrow Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want to make enemies, try to change something

Quote.Author: Woodrow Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: Prosperity is necessarily the first theme of a political campaign

Quote.Author: Woodrow Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: That a peasant may become king does not render the kingdom democratic

Quote.Author: Woodrow Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: A conservative is someone who makes no changes and consults his grandmother when in doubt

Quote.Author: Woody Harrelson
Quote.QuoteValue: A grownup is a child with layers on

Quote.Author: Woody Harrelson
Quote.QuoteValue: The war against terrorism is terrorism

Quote.Author: Woody Harrelson
Quote.QuoteValue: Salma is just one of the great goddesses ever put on this Earth

Quote.Author: Woody Harrelson
Quote.QuoteValue: Well for six years during Cheers I couldn't get another job

Quote.Author: Woody Harrelson
Quote.QuoteValue: My main hope for myself is to be where I am

Quote.Author: Woody Harrelson
Quote.QuoteValue: To the men in Washington, the world is just a giant Monopoly board

Quote.Author: Woody Harrelson
Quote.QuoteValue: It's an odd beast, fame. It's got multiple personalities

Quote.Author: Woody Harrelson
Quote.QuoteValue: Two boxes of Step Forward Paper saves one tree - that's a real stat

Quote.Author: Woody Harrelson
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I've been an incredible example to my kids of what not to do

Quote.Author: Woody Harrelson
Quote.QuoteValue: We've killed a million Iraqis since the start of the Gulf war - mostly by blocking humanitarian aid

Quote.Author: Woody Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not very smart, but I recognize that I am not very smart

Quote.Author: Woody Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't apologize for anything. When I make a mistake, I take the blame and go on from there

Quote.Author: Woody Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: Success is the only motivational factor that a boy with character needs

Quote.Author: Woody Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: There's nothing that cleanses your soul like getting the hell kicked out of you

Quote.Author: Woody Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: The bowl games are only supposed to be a fun reward

Quote.Author: Woody Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like nice people. I like tough, honest people

Quote.Author: Woody Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: I may not be able to outsmart too many people, but I can outwork 'em

Quote.Author: Woody Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing that comes easy is worth a dime

Quote.Author: Woody Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: Without winners, there wouldn't even be any civilization

Quote.Author: Woody Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: A man is always better than he thinks

Quote.Author: Wyclef Jean
Quote.QuoteValue: Bob Marley stood for universal peace and love. He tried to break racial barriers

Quote.Author: Wyclef Jean
Quote.QuoteValue: Every generation is gonna keep changing, and you just have to embrace the change

Quote.Author: Wyclef Jean
Quote.QuoteValue: I lived in the projects and the ghetto, and turned the negative into a positive

Quote.Author: Wyclef Jean
Quote.QuoteValue: You know, I'm a modern day Harry Belafonte; I got the swagger of the island

Quote.Author: Wyclef Jean
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm hands-on with everything, always trying to reach the real people

Quote.Author: Wyclef Jean
Quote.QuoteValue: All that violence in the world, we need to stop that

Quote.Author: Wyclef Jean
Quote.QuoteValue: I do music for the love of it, and I've been doing it from a very young age: about 11

Quote.Author: Wyclef Jean
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm the hip-hop Quincy Jones of today

Quote.Author: Wyclef Jean
Quote.QuoteValue: There's not a hip-hop artist that didn't snatch of piece of Bob Marley. It's totally impossible

Quote.Author: Wyclef Jean
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to go against the grain, against what's out there. Every day is like a challenge

Quote.Author: Wylie Dufresne
Quote.QuoteValue: My mother made the best scrambled eggs, super-loose and soft

Quote.Author: Wylie Dufresne
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think of eggs as being fundamental to the flavor of mayonnaise, but they are to Hollandaise

Quote.Author: Wylie Dufresne
Quote.QuoteValue: American cheese is the perfect soft taco

Quote.Author: Wylie Dufresne
Quote.QuoteValue: I can fry hollandaise, I can fry ketchup, I can fry mustard
